preconditions.precondition: App Developer needs to perform an operation on a Dataset Instance.

successEndConditions.condition: Operation on the Dataset Instance is successfully executed.

mainSequence.step: CLI Tool requests the operation on the Dataset Instance.
Dataset Management System executes the operation on the Dataset Instance.
Dataset Instance successfully completes the operation.
Dataset Management System confirms the success.
CLI Tool displays success message to the App Developer.
REST API requests Dataset Instances from Dataset Management System.
Dataset Management System returns Dataset Instances to REST API.
REST API shows Dataset Instances in the UI.
App Developer selects a Dataset Instance and operation in the UI.
UI Application sends a POST request for the operation to REST API.
REST API requests Dataset Management System to execute the operation on the selected Dataset Instance.
Dataset Management System performs the operation on the Dataset Instance.
Dataset Instance successfully completes the operation.
Dataset Management System confirms the success of the operation.
REST API displays a success message to the UI.
UI Application displays a success message to the App Developer.
